as.leap

Class LCTwitterUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • as.leap.LCTwitterUtils

  • public final class LCTwitterUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a set of utilities for using LC with Twitter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TwitterPlatform getPlatform()
      Gets the shared Twitter singleton that LC is using.
      static TwitterProvider getProvider() 
      static void initialize(java.lang.String consumerKey, java.lang.String consumerSecret)
      Initializes Twitter for use with LC.

      Returns true if the user is linked to a Twitter account.
      static void linkInBackground(LCUser user, android.app.Activity activity, SaveCallback saveCallback)
      Links a LCUser to a Twitter account, allowing you to use Twitter for authentication, and providing access to Twitter data for the user.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.lang.String consumerKey,
                              java.lang.String consumerSecret)
        Initializes Twitter for use with LC.
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Your Twitter consumer key.
        consumerSecret - Your Twitter consumer secret.

      • logInInBackground

        public static void logInInBackground(android.app.Activity activity,
                                     LogInCallback<LCUser> callback)
        Logs in a LCUser using Twitter for authentication. If a user for the given Twitter credentials does not already exist, a new user will be created. A dialog will be shown to the user for Twitter authentication.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Android activity.
        callback - Callback for notifying the calling application when the Twitter authentication has completed, failed, or been canceled.

      • logInBackground

        public static void logInBackground(java.lang.String screenName,
                                   java.lang.String authToken,
                                   java.lang.String authTokenSecret,
                                   LogInCallback<LCUser> callback)

      • isLinked

        public static boolean isLinked(LCUser user)
        Returns true if the user is linked to a Twitter account.
        Parameters:
        user - User to check for Twitter.
        Returns:
        True if the user has Twitter credentials. False if the user has't got Twitter credentials.

      • linkInBackground

        public static void linkInBackground(LCUser user,
                                    android.app.Activity activity,
                                    SaveCallback saveCallback)
        Links a LCUser to a Twitter account, allowing you to use Twitter for authentication, and providing access to Twitter data for the user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to linkInBackground to a Twitter account.
        activity - The Android activity.
        saveCallback - Callback for notifying the calling application when the Twitter authentication has completed, failed, or been canceled.

      • linkInBackground

        public static void linkInBackground(LCUser user,
                                    java.lang.String screenName,
                                    java.lang.String authToken,
                                    java.lang.String authTokenSecret,
                                    SaveCallback callback)

      • unlinkInBackground

        public static void unlinkInBackground(LCUser user,
                                      SaveCallback saveCallback)
        Unlinks a user from a Twitter account in the background. Unlinking a user will save the user's data.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to linkInBackground to a Twitter account.
        saveCallback - Callback for notifying the calling application .
